message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $13,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't accept a price that low. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
